tool_description: Allows for contexto integration into other services, feature to get second word
title: ContextoGuess

api_list.name: Home
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contextoguess.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contextoguess.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSecondWord
api_list.description: returns the second word for a given game
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contextoguess.p.rapidapi.com/getSecondWord/{game}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contextoguess.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: guessWord
api_list.description: guess a word and it will return the position it holds
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contextoguess.p.rapidapi.com/guessWord/{game}/{guess}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contextoguess.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
